reentrant call."}]},"events":{"Borrow(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint16,uint256)":{"details":"emitted on borrow","params":{"_amount":"the amount to be deposited","_borrowBalanceIncrease":"the balance increase since the last borrow, 0 if it's the first time borrowing","_borrowRate":"the rate at which the user has borrowed","_borrowRateMode":"the rate mode, can be either 1-stable or 2-variable","_originationFee":"the origination fee to be paid by the user","_referral":"the referral number of the action","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user"}},"Deposit(address,address,uint256,uint16,uint256)":{"details":"emitted on deposit","params":{"_amount":"the amount to be deposited","_referral":"the referral number of the action","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user"}},"FlashLoan(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emitted when a flashloan is executed","params":{"_amount":"the amount requested","_protocolFee":"the part of the fee for the protocol","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_target":"the address of the flashLoanReceiver","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_totalFee":"the total fee on the amount"}},"LiquidationCall(address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,bool,uint256)":{"details":"emitted when a borrower is liquidated","params":{"_accruedBorrowInterest":"the amount of interest accrued by the borrower since the last action","_collateral":"the address of the collateral being liquidated","_liquidatedCollateralAmount":"the amount of collateral being liquidated","_liquidator":"the address of the liquidator","_purchaseAmount":"the total amount liquidated","_receiveAToken":"true if the liquidator wants to receive aTokens, false otherwise","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user being liquidated"}},"OriginationFeeLiquidated(address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emitted when a borrow fee is liquidated","params":{"_collateral":"the address of the collateral being liquidated","_feeLiquidated":"the total fee liquidated","_liquidatedCollateralForFee":"the amount of collateral received by the protocol in exchange for the fee","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user being liquidated"}},"RebalanceStableBorrowRate(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emitted when the stable rate of a user gets rebalanced","params":{"_borrowBalanceIncrease":"the balance increase since the last action","_newStableRate":"the new stable borrow rate after the rebalance","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user for which the rebalance has been executed"}},"RedeemUnderlying(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emitted during a redeem action.","params":{"_amount":"the amount to be deposited","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user"}},"Repay(address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emitted on repay","params":{"_amountMinusFees":"the amount repaid minus fees","_borrowBalanceIncrease":"the balance increase since the last action","_fees":"the fees repaid","_repayer":"the address of the user that has performed the repay action","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user for which the repay has been executed"}},"ReserveUsedAsCollateralDisabled(address,address)":{"details":"emitted when a user disables a reserve as collateral","params":{"_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_user":"the address of the user*"}},"ReserveUsedAsCollateralEnabled(address,address)":{"details":"emitted when a user enables a reserve as collateral","params":{"_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_user":"the address of the user*"}},"Swap(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emitted when a user performs a rate swap","params":{"_borrowBalanceIncrease":"the balance increase since the last action","_newRate":"the new borrow rate","_newRateMode":"the new interest rate mode","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_timestamp":"the timestamp of the action*","_user":"the address of the user executing the swap"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"borrow(address,uint256,uint256,uint16)":{"details":"Allows users to borrow a specific amount of the reserve currency, provided that the borrower already deposited enough collateral.","params":{"_amount":"the amount to be borrowed","_interestRateMode":"the interest rate mode at which the user wants to borrow. Can be 0 (STABLE) or 1 (VARIABLE)*","_reserve":"the address of the reserve"}},"deposit(address,uint256,uint16)":{"details":"deposits The underlying asset into the reserve. A corresponding amount of the overlying asset (aTokens) is minted.","params":{"_amount":"the amount to be deposited","_referralCode":"integrators are assigned a referral code and can potentially receive rewards.*","_reserve":"the address of the reserve"}},"flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"allows smartcontracts to access the liquidity of the pool within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned. NOTE There are security concerns for developers of flashloan receiver contracts that must be kept into consideration. For further details please visit https://developers.aave.com","params":{"_amount":"the amount requested for this flashloan*","_receiver":"The address of the contract receiving the funds. The receiver should implement the IFlashLoanReceiver interface.","_reserve":"the address of the principal reserve"}},"getReserveConfigurationData(address)":{"details":"accessory functions to fetch data from the core contract*"},"initialize(address)":{"details":"this function is invoked by the proxy contract when the LendingPool contract is added to the AddressesProvider.","params":{"_addressesProvider":"the address of the LendingPoolAddressesProvider registry*"}},"liquidationCall(address,address,address,uint256,bool)":{"details":"users can invoke this function to liquidate an undercollateralized position.","params":{"_purchaseAmount":"the amount of principal that the liquidator wants to repay","_receiveAToken":"true if the liquidators wants to receive the aTokens, false if he wants to receive the underlying asset directly*","_reserve":"the address of the principal reserve","_user":"the address of the borrower"}},"rebalanceStableBorrowRate(address,address)":{"details":"rebalances the stable interest rate of a user if current liquidity rate > user stable rate. this is regulated by Aave to ensure that the protocol is not abused, and the user is paying a fair rate. Anyone can call this function though.","params":{"_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_user":"the address of the user to be rebalanced*"}},"redeemUnderlying(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Redeems the underlying amount of assets requested by _user. This function is executed by the overlying aToken contract in response to a redeem action.","params":{"_amount":"the underlying amount to be redeemed*","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_user":"the address of the user performing the action"}},"setUserUseReserveAsCollateral(address,bool)":{"details":"allows depositors to enable or disable a specific deposit as collateral.","params":{"_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_useAsCollateral":"true if the user wants to user the deposit as collateral, false otherwise.*"}},"swapBorrowRateMode(address)":{"details":"borrowers can user this function to swap between stable and variable borrow rate modes.","params":{"_reserve":"the address of the reserve on which the user borrowed*"}}},"title":"LendingPool contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"Implements the actions of the LendingPool, and exposes accessory methods to fetch the users and reserve borrow(address,uint256,uint256,uint16).details: Allows users to borrow a specific amount of the reserve currency, provided that the borrower already deposited enough collateral.

params._interestRateMode: the interest rate mode at which the user wants to borrow. Can be 0 (STABLE) or 1 (VARIABLE)*

deposit(address,uint256,uint16).details: deposits The underlying asset into the reserve. A corresponding amount of the overlying asset (aTokens) is minted.

params._referralCode: integrators are assigned a referral code and can potentially receive rewards.*

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: allows smartcontracts to access the liquidity of the pool within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned. NOTE There are security concerns for developers of flashloan receiver contracts that must be kept into consideration. For further details please visit https://developers.aave.com

params._amount: the amount requested for this flashloan*
params._receiver: The address of the contract receiving the funds. The receiver should implement the IFlashLoanReceiver interface.
params._reserve: the address of the principal reserve

getReserveConfigurationData(address).details: accessory functions to fetch data from the core contract*

initialize(address).details: this function is invoked by the proxy contract when the LendingPool contract is added to the AddressesProvider.

params._addressesProvider: the address of the LendingPoolAddressesProvider registry*

liquidationCall(address,address,address,.details: users can invoke this function to liquidate an undercollateralized position.

params._purchaseAmount: the amount of principal that the liquidator wants to repay
params._receiveAToken: true if the liquidators wants to receive the aTokens, false if he wants to receive the underlying asset directly*
params._reserve: the address of the principal reserve

rebalanceStableBorrowRate(address,addres.details: rebalances the stable interest rate of a user if current liquidity rate > user stable rate. this is regulated by Aave to ensure that the protocol is not abused, and the user is paying a fair rate. Anyone can call this function though.

params._user: the address of the user to be rebalanced*

redeemUnderlying(address,address,uint256.details: Redeems the underlying amount of assets requested by _user. This function is executed by the overlying aToken contract in response to a redeem action.

params._amount: the underlying amount to be redeemed*
params._user: the address of the user performing the action

setUserUseReserveAsCollateral(address,bo.details: allows depositors to enable or disable a specific deposit as collateral.

params._useAsCollateral: true if the user wants to user the deposit as collateral, false otherwise.*

swapBorrowRateMode(address).details: borrowers can user this function to swap between stable and variable borrow rate modes.

params._reserve: the address of the reserve on which the user borrowed*

statements.documentation:
Following conditions need to be met if the user is borrowing at a stable rate:
 1. Reserve must be enabled for stable rate borrowing
 2. Users cannot borrow from the reserve if their collateral is (mostly) the same currency
    they are borrowing, to prevent abuses.
 3. Users will be able to borrow only a relatively small, configurable amount of the total
    liquidity*

statements.documentation:
user wants to swap to stable, before swapping we need to ensure that
 1. stable borrow rate is enabled on the reserve
 2. user is not trying to abuse the reserve by depositing
 more collateral than he is borrowing, artificially lowering
 the interest rate, borrowing at variable, and switching to stable*
